title: What really happened with Maokai's Rework
body:
{{champion:57}} I don't know.  Somehow this seems wrong.
{{champion:17}} What is wrong?
{{champion:57}} Just placing saplings all over the map and waiting for people to walk into them.
{{champion:17}} And what is wrong with that?
{{champion:57}} Well...I mean shouldn't we be fighting or something.  I mean I am a tank.
{{champion:17}} Do you have any shields?
{{champion:57}} No.
{{champion:17}} Armor or magic resistance buffs?
{{champion:57}} no.
{{champion:17}} Do you gain a bonus to your max health?
{{champion:57}} No but I do heal a bit.
{{champion:17}} So you have sustain for laning?
{{champion:57}} Well....yeah.
{{champion:17}} Does that sound like a tank to you?
{{champion:57}} No...not really....but I mean I'm supposed to be a top laner right?
{{champion:17}} Yes, you are but now you do it my way.  Riot brought you to me as a mess of a champion in need of a rework.  So I have been training you.
{{champion:57}} But...all you've told me is to place saplings all over the place and build ap.
{{champion:17}} Exactly, and now we wait for some fool to come and fight us.  Normally the jungler.
{{champion:57}} But...shouldn't I help the team?
{{champion:17}} NO!
{{champion:57}} Why?
{{champion:17}} Because the enemy will come to you and you will be ready.  If you really had a team they would come to you and your saplings.
{{champion:57}} I donno.
{{champion:17}} Shhh. Wait.  I hear someone coming.
{{champion:86}} Damacia.  Do do do do.  Damacia.  Do do do do.
"Sapling runs at Garren"
{{champion:86}} Oh.  Hey you cute thing.  Are you lost?
"explodes on Garren"
{{champion:86}} Gah....my god...this ouch....  I think I'll just.... "steps on mushroom"
"explodes"
{{champion:86}} ......gah......"crawling away"
{{champion:17}} Okay, now you go and attack him.
{{champion:57}} Isn't that....kinda dirty?
{{champion:17}} Nah.  Here, jsut toss another sapling.  That should do the trick.
"ENEMY SLAIN"
{{champion:57}} That...seemed really easy.
{{champion:17}} I know right?  They just keep walking into them.  Hell, yours chase them down.
{{champion:57}} Yeah, I guess so.  So I just need to build Liandry's?
{{champion:17}} Yep.  You don't even need to kill them, they just need to keep heading back to base with no CS.
{{champion:57}} I'm still not comfortable with this.
{{champion:17}} Alright, alright.  here.  "hands Maokai a little green mushroom hat"
{{champion:57}} What will this do?
{{champion:17}} Just put it on.
{{champion:57}} ......"Puts it on"
{{champion:17}} Do you understand now.
{{champion:57}} Not really.
{{champion:17}} well give it time.  If you start finding everyone hating you you will know you're on the right track.
{{champion:57}} What?  Hating me?  Why?
{{champion:17}} I don't know.
{{champion:57}} Are you sure I can't just build a Sunfire cape?
{{champion:17}} Nope.
{{champion:57}} But I liked being a tank.
{{champion:17}} Sorry Riot left you in my charge.  They said to rework you into something new.
{{champion:57}} But I liked the old me.
{{champion:17}} Well...i mean if you really want to I could probably train you to be a support tank.
{{champion:57}} NO....no anything but that!
{{champion:17}} Alright then.  AP Maokai it is.
{{champion:57}} Why do I have a bad feeling about this.
{{champion:17}} bah, don't worry about it.  We will give you some more changes to follow up with the rework.
{{champion:57}} A really really really bad feeling.

replies.body: He became such a offense to his family roots.
https://i.giphy.com/ac7MA7r5IMYda.gif

But at least they did leaf something of his old self. His ult does branch out now, compared to the old one.
Shall we say his wood is more polished now, or does that give for a potentially _very_ wrong phrasing.

Personally, his current state is not really what I feel I got the laurel wreath for last season.

> [{quoted}](name=Velzard of Koz,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=KKTWHX2A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-12T01:31:52.228+0000)
>
> He became such a offense to his family roots.

LELLLLLLLL

He's just... He's gonna be the new Malzahar.

Ripped out of his role, changed to a frustrating and uninteractive support, then nerfed to the ground 3 patches later and lef to be useless.
Did you think teemo helping with Maokai's "rework" would have a happy ending?
There is a reason it's called a Teemoian Deal... I think that's the right term.
Teemonic

You, sir/ma'am, nailed it!

https://img.ifcdn.com/images/761288ea943c62b787e59b44a5f66fb85b981f6c59867be4ade8f72ccfaa4c5c_1.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Jharr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=KKTWHX2A,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-05-12T02:03:01.611+0000)
>
> Did you think teemo helping with Maokai's "rework" would have a happy ending?

Demon Teemo training ghostly tree to become a healthy character? 

Why does this seem like a terrible idea just from a few words? ._.

So...we can expect Spooky Maokai shortly, right?

Or was it the other way around? So, if this was pre-rework

http://gatorpress.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/scary-tree.jpg

...this is post?

https://images-cdn.9gag.com/photo/av0Wqvn_700b.jpg

_Re-reading my own words there, I just read "(com)post-rework"..._ :/
This makes me want to see a teemo/mao bot lane duo. Let the world burn
ima start ruining bronzies lives with this? thank you for the idea
That....is evil.
thats the point of it lol {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Welp, I know what I'm doing tonight with a friend

>Let the world {{summoner:14}} 

https://images.rapgenius.com/d6e8b653d4422c50fee942f4e36593e7.891x534x8.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Beowulf8806,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=KKTWHX2A,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-05-12T05:28:06.694+0000)
>
> This makes me want to see a teemo/mao bot lane duo. Let the world burn

I've played against it, it was a miserable experience.
He never felt like a tank to me, more of a diver. And wasn't he brought back into the jungle?
he is a tree, so wouldn't he belong there?

>he is a tree, so wouldn't he belong there [in the jungle]?

No, he wouldn't. Don't you remember they reworked stealth not that long ago? There's nothing too obvious anymore.

The point  ----> ●
-
-
-
You ------------------>


(If you dont get it, the point went way over your head)

http://img05.deviantart.net/b35e/i/2015/319/9/d/head_in_a_box_by_greg20033-d9gs5pi.png

I get the joke. A tree belongs in the jungle. And my attempted joke was referring to how they kill off all the memes. Graves cigar, BM Diana, Devil Teemo etc.

Which would mean a meme involving a tree and the jungle _naturally_ couldn't be a thing.

Thought my phrasing made my sarcasm above apparent.

What I read at the end:

>http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/August_2012/2102_08_17_Contest_Reminder/examplecomic_thumb.jpg

But that awkward moment when the apprentice surpasses the master and tries to kill him...

http://orig09.deviantart.net/9144/f/2012/235/e/a/lol_comic_contest____a_budding_romance___by_farahboom-d5c3uou.jpg
Same!
I feel like the entire thing was just a big ploy to sell more skins :D
Poor maokai. He sold his soul to Satan.

>Poor Maokai

Actually, considering the attitude of the saplings, I can understand him.

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/fb6268d2afe8ca4b448c204d568d6b5a.png http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/7ba14d0543300b5c613c76a2cc2164da.jpg
I love Zaunderground's art. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/player/NA/FarahBoom
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/YrZ9NABi-aram-adventures-my-comics-page-join-fellow-aramers

I _think_ Farahboom/Zaunderground is pretty much the same guy, or at the very least a collaboration, because I can't tell their art apart.

Does it matter?
Here, have an exploitable.

http://i.imgur.com/qnrLVl5.png?b

Oh no, that's Jinx and...it's _something_ from the void. Or was it that Robot Rampage bonus page? I obviously wouldn't know, but that's what it looks like.

TL;DR:
We need Janitor Jax, right now!

_I'm snagging this btw._

I obviously wouldn't know it's the latter.

[What I just read.](http://weknowmemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/10/finally-my-fleshlight-is-on-its-way.jpg) 
_Daymn!_

...So, Maokai - what you think of his rework? Personally, I feel sorta cheated.
Also, his ult now covers the entire width of the ARAM map. Which is sorta OP.

> [{quoted}](name=PaladinNO,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=KKTWHX2A,comment-id=00050000000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-13T19:14:27.331+0000)

> [What I just read.](http://weknowmemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/10/finally-my-fleshlight-is-on-its-way.jpg) 
> _Daymn!_

It's a donut.

Donut. Steel.

Geddit?


>...So, Maokai - what you think of his rework? Personally, I feel sorta cheated.
Also, his ult now covers the entire width of the ARAM map. Which is sorta OP.

How would I know? I haven't played a single match in a month.

All I can see is that he changed from a top lane tank to an AP support overnight.

http://i.imgur.com/Iyf8wqG.jpg?b

>Donut. Steel.

So's the image in my quote. xD

>How would I know? I haven't played a single match in a month.

Good man. I'm trying to cut back myself. And I too hven't played LMAOkai since his rework. Played against him twice, but I don't count that.

>So's the image in my quote. xD

You're either massively trolling me right now or are genuinely oblivious.

>Good man. I'm trying to cut back myself.

I haven't really done it on purpose. I simply lost interest in this fuckfest.

>And I too hven't played LMAOkai since his rework.

The only reason I even have him on my accounts is because I was Gold last season.
Let alone play him.

>trolling [...] oblivious

This late at night, I'm not really able to tell. Though I do get the feeling I'm missing the point. Sorry.

>I simply lost interest in this fuckfest.

After they deliberately ruined ARAM, the last refuge of fun in this game (gg FeralPony), and for some reason refusing to respond to any of my inquiries, my interest recently took a massive hit too.
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/ou8FmdQG-aram-changes-for-710

_RIP season 3, back when this game was good._

>This late at night, I'm not really able to tell. Though I do get the feeling I'm missing the point. Sorry.

"Donut steel."

Try reading it out loud and think how it relates to your "_I'm snagging this btw._"

Amen to that!

He got such a simplistic art style - yet there is no doubt in the point he's trying to convey. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
_He even got an account around here, though he hasn't posted in years (I can only imagine the mods are to "thank" for that)._

Reblogged
Oh wait this isn't tumblr?
the thing about maokai saplings is the same issue with caitlyn traps, you know they are there, but what can you do but avoid them?
id rather get trapped in caits trap.. than get those sapling explode on you 3x.... and caits trap doesnt chase you either lol
At least in lane the minions can trigger the saplings for you. Caitlyn can just set up a bunch of traps right under your turret and you can't even defend it.

This is hilarious (when he put the hat on I died) and also explains the problem in a way Riot might get. 

Stop classifying him as a tank. He's a health mage.
